pr_title: Cancel proxy requests when the proxy channel closes

timeline.message: Cancel proxy requests when the proxy channel closes

timeline.bodyText: Rather than requiring every registration to record correctly whether the proxied task is cancellable or not, could we call wrapped.createTask() and decide whether to create a CancellableTask or just a regular Task based on whether the wrapped request's task was cancellable or not? At least we should assert that they match, or else we'll forget to update the argument to the proxy registration in future if we ever add cancellability  to another task.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
